ygData.subject: Re: ATTACK!
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, having the base fly in for a flashy entrance was one thing, but using it this much in battle is quickly turning into a violation of the mobile base rule.

From: Yanshosh@...

Ok, having the base fly in for a flashy entrance was one thing, but using it this much in battle is quickly turning into a violation of the mobile base rule. Can you please have it land somewhere soon?

::Killfest/Scyther/EndBringer/Demise/Incarcinator::

Killfest makes his way through the corridors after they open for the attackers, emerging at the ruined bridge and seeing the comotion. He aims his missile launchers up at the scorpion bot and fires two missiles at him, sending a transmission to his troops.

"My troops are on their way," he says to Cygnar as his missile launcher reloads.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In the bridge of the Blackfortress, Scyther suddenly jumps up as he recieves an order from Killfest, bolting from the room.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer follows Prebon and the other bot a bit behind for a while, but then a transmission from Killfest interrups him, and he takes off toward the exit of the Blackfortress.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Emerging from the CR chamber, Incarcinator groans upon recieving Killfest's message. "One battle after another.."

He walks out of the base, flying off toward the Trainer base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Demise looks up at Starscream, burping a bit. "I'm fine." His eyes suddenly light up. "Battle! I must go."

He gets back to his feet and runs out of the room as fast as his four appendages could carry him, thankful for Killfest's orders to get some battle in.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> > :::The Destrocons:::
> > 
> > ::they land near where Cygnar and Cyanide are standing::
> > Ramjet: Hey, we got here first. And we've been planning this for 
> even longer. 
> > The Trainers belong to the Destrons.
> > ::he looks to Cygnar::
> > Ramjet: What should we do?
> 
> As the Destrocons land near Cyanide, the Violator drops in altitude 
> and reactivates its shields, hving lowered them when Skywarp had 
> taken the scorpion tank. The ship then flys above the Destrocons and 
> 3 laser cannons lock onto each of them. Inside the ship the floor 
> opens and Gemini 1 and two step out and hover in the air between the 
> shield and the ship. The scorpion tank then aims at the Destrocons 
> with all of its weapons.
> 
> Skywarp: "These "trainers" belong to us. Get in our way and you die."
